directions: Mix water, oats, and a dash of salt together in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on 50% power until oatmeal is chewy and tender, about 5 minutes. Stir. Mix in butter, seasoning blend, salt, and pepper. Let stand for 1 minute before serving.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon butter, or more to taste
1/8 teaspoon seasoning blend (such as Vegeta®), or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Easy Savory Oatmeal for One
